On Wed, 23 Jul 2003 20:41:39 -0000, jxingtang wrote:

>How do I verify that command line arguments are 
>extracted corrctly to the right private member variables?

Write a method
public String getParamValue(String paramName, String[] args)
and write tests for this method.

Your private members can then be initialized with
private int myPrivateInteger = getParamValues("port", prgArgs);
and there will be no need to access private members.

Another approach might be the use of test-cases defined as inner classes.
